verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> afterward, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2517><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> went throughout <S%G1353><s%> every city <S%G2596><s%> <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> village, <S%G2968><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> showing the glad tidings <S%G2097><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> were with <S%G4862><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had been <S%G2258><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> of <S%G575><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> infirmities, <S%G769><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Joanna <S%G2489><s%> the wife <S%G1135><s%> of Chuza <S%G5529><s%> Herod's <S%G2264><s%> steward, <S%G2012><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Susanna, <S%G4677><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> substance. <S%G5224><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> were gathered together, <S%G4896><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were come <S%G1975><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of every city, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G4172><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> a parable: <S%G3850><s%>

A sower <S%G4687><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> to sow <S%G4687><s%> his <S%G848><s%> seed: <S%G4703><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way side; <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it was trodden down, <S%G2662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> air <S%G3772><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> a rock; <S%G4073><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as soon as it was sprung up, <S%G5453><s%> it withered away, <S%G3583><s%> because it lacked <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3361><s%> moisture. <S%G2429><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> thorns; <S%G173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> sprang up with <S%G4855><s%> it, and choked <S%G638><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> good <S%G18><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sprang up, <S%G5453><s%> and bare <S%G4160><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> a hundredfold. <S%G1542><s%> And when he had said <S%G3004><s%> these things, <S%G3778><s%> he cried, <S%G5455><s%> He that hath <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> might this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> be? <S%G1498><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Unto you <S%G5213><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> to others <S%G3062><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables; <S%G3850><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> they might not <S%G3361><s%> see, <S%G991><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> they might not <S%G3361><s%> understand. <S%G4920><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way side <S%G3598><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they that hear; <S%G191><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil, <S%G1228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> taketh away <S%G142><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> they should believe <S%G4100><s%> and be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> are they, which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they hear, <S%G191><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joy; <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a while <S%G2540><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> of temptation <S%G3986><s%> fall away. <S%G868><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> that which fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they, which, when they have heard, <S%G191><s%> go forth, <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are choked <S%G4846><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> cares <S%G3308><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pleasures <S%G2237><s%> of this life, <S%G979><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bring no fruit to perfection. <S%G5052><s%> <S%G3756><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they, <S%G3748><s%> which in <S%G1722><s%> an honest <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> good <S%G18><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> having heard <S%G191><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> keep <S%G2722><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> bring forth fruit <S%G2592><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> patience. <S%G5281><s%>

No man, <S%G3762><s%> when he hath lighted <S%G681><s%> a candle, <S%G3088><s%> covereth <S%G2572><s%> it <S%G846><s%> with a vessel, <S%G4632><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> putteth <S%G5087><s%> it under <S%G5270><s%> a bed; <S%G2825><s%> but <S%G235><s%> setteth <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> a candlestick, <S%G3087><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they which enter in <S%G1531><s%> may see <S%G991><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light. <S%G5457><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> secret, <S%G2927><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest; <S%G5318><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> any thing hid, <S%G614><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> abroad. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5318><s%>

Take heed <S%G991><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> ye hear: <S%G191><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> hath, <S%G2192><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> shall be given; <S%G1325><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he seemeth <S%G1380><s%> to have. <S%G2192><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come at <S%G4940><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> press. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it was told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%> by certain which said, <S%G3004><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> without, <S%G1854><s%> desiring <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> which hear <S%G191><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> a certain <S%G3391><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples: <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> Let us go over <S%G1330><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other side <S%G4008><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> lake. <S%G3041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> they launched forth. <S%G321><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> sailed <S%G4126><s%> he fell asleep: <S%G879><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there came down <S%G2597><s%> a storm <S%G2978><s%> of wind <S%G417><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lake; <S%G3041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were filled <S%G4845><s%> with water, and <S%G2532><s%> were in jeopardy. <S%G2793><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they came <S%G4334><s%> to him, and awoke <S%G1326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> master, <S%G1988><s%> we perish. <S%G622><s%> Then <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> arose, <S%G1453><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> raging <S%G2830><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> water: <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they ceased, <S%G3973><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a calm. <S%G1055><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> they being afraid <S%G5399><s%> wondered, <S%G2296><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> one to another, <S%G240><s%> <S%G4314><s%> What manner of man <S%G5101><s%> <S%G686><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this! <S%G3778><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he commandeth <S%G2004><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they obey <S%G5219><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they arrived <S%G2668><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Gadarenes, <S%G1046><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> over against <S%G495><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> land, <S%G1093><s%> there met <S%G5221><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> <S%G1537><s%> long time, <S%G2425><s%> <S%G5550><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wore <S%G1737><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> clothes, <S%G2440><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> abode <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> any house, <S%G3614><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tombs. <S%G3418><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> he cried out, <S%G349><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fell down before <S%G4363><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> What have I to do with thee, <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1698><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> most high? <S%G5310><s%> I beseech <S%G1189><s%> thee, <S%G4675><s%> torment <S%G928><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> not. <S%G3361><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> he had commanded <S%G3853><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> to come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man. <S%G444><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> oftentimes <S%G4183><s%> <S%G5550><s%> it had caught <S%G4884><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was kept <S%G5442><s%> bound <S%G1196><s%> with chains <S%G254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in fetters; <S%G3976><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he broke <S%G1284><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bands, <S%G1199><s%> and was driven <S%G1643><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1142><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness.) <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> thy <S%G4671><s%> name? <S%G3686><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Legion: <S%G3003><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> were entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would not <S%G3361><s%> command <S%G2004><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to go out <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> deep. <S%G12><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> an herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G2425><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%> feeding <S%G1006><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mountain: <S%G3735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they besought <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would suffer <S%G2010><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> them. <S%G1565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he suffered <S%G2010><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> swine: <S%G5519><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> ran violently <S%G3729><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> a steep place <S%G2911><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> lake, <S%G3041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were choked. <S%G638><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> they that fed <S%G1006><s%> them saw <S%G1492><s%> what was done, <S%G1096><s%> they fled, <S%G5343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> it in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> country. <S%G68><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> they went out <S%G1831><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> what was done; <S%G1096><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> were departed, <S%G1831><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> clothed, <S%G2439><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in his right mind: <S%G4993><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>
